```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(primer.data)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r, warning = FALSE}
nhanes $ height

nhanes |> 
  drop_na(height) |> 
  select(height) |>  
  ggplot(mapping = aes(x = height)) +
        geom_histogram(fill = "steelblue", color = "black") +
        labs(title = "Histogram of Heights", x = "Height", y = "Count", 
             caption = "Source: nhanes")
        
```
